description:
Transfer your data faster than ever with premium quality UtechSmart USB 3.0 card readers. It can more than double your real world data transfer  
speeds, cutting the time to access your media in half.Small enough for a laptop or tablet case, with no power supply and only a USB 3 cable to connect the device, this is a great option for on-the-go 
digital photo enthusiasts. Anyone who wants to quickly copy pictures to their notebook or tablet and get back to shooting will love this card reader!Broad CompatibilityConnect instantly to your SDXC (up to 2TB), SDHC, SD, CF, High-Speed CF(UDMA), MS, M2, Micro SDXC,Micro SDHC ,Micro SD.System RequirementsWindows 2000 / ME/ XP / Vista / 7 / 8 (32bit/ 64bit ), MAC OS 10.X or above version.Macintosh computer with USB support.In the box1 Card reader,1 USB 3.0 A to USB 3.0 Micro B cable ,1 User Manual.Usage tips*For older versions of Windows XP or Mac OS X, you may need to install operating system upgrades / patches to support the exFAT file system of many high
capacity cards of 64GB or higher.*Data transfer rates are subject to the speed of the memory card itself.*To properly insert a CF card, please ensure proper orientation by confirming that the side grooves are facing / aligned with the dock ridges. Then, gently 
push the card straight in toward the pins until the card is fully seated.
title: UtechSmart USB 3.0 Superspeed Multi-in-1 4-Slots Memory Card Reader for UHS-I SD,SDXC, SDHC, SD, CF, High-Speed CF (UDMA), MS, M2, Micro SDXC, Micro SDHC, Micro SD Cards
